info.title: Taxi API
info.description: TSP connector API specs for taxis used to connect from/to SkedGo's platform.

tags.name: Configuration
tags.description: Provider Configuration info, including endpoints implemented, coverage and TO info

tags.name: Booking-TO
tags.description: Transport operator booking flow, SkedGo will use these endpoints to create/manage bookings

tags.name: Booking-MP
tags.description: Mobility provider interactions, SkedGo will listen to these endpoints for updates from TO

tags.name: Account
tags.description: Account management, if needed to create/retrieve shallow user accounts on TP

get.description: All the coverage areas that this operator serves, including optionally (but highly recommended!) information on products and prices. Information about each area is returned as a GeoJSON Feature, within a single GeoJSON FeatureCollection.

assetClass.description: These classes are taken from the NeTeX standard, but ALL and UNKNOWN are removed. On the other hand OTHER and PARKING are added.

assetSubClass.description: a more precise classification of the asset, like 'cargo bike', 'public bus', 'coach bus', 'office bus', 'water taxi', 'segway'. This is mandatory when using 'OTHER' as class.

AssetType.description: The asset type used in this leg as determined during booking

id.description: A unique identifier for the TO to know this booking by

legs.description: The legs of this booking, generally just one for simple trips, and two for round-trips.

callbackUrl.description: base callback/webhook url to send updates to (see /bookings/{bookingID}/events and /legs/{legID}/events)

productId.description: Product id of the product/trip to be created/booked

isValidated.description: Whether this traveler's identity and properties have been verified by the MaaS provider

age.description: Age of the traveler, may be approximate

referenceNumber.description: reference number of the traveler. This number could be used to refer to in the planning result (Currently used for device id)

id.description: The identifier MaaS uses to identify the customer, required if the provider supports accounts

phone.description: customer phone, required if the provider does not supports accounts

email.description: customer email, required if the provider does not supports accounts

Customer.description: The user that wants to make this booking

ExtraInfo.description: Arbitrary information that a TO can add

version.description: v1: original implementation - v2: using BOOKING_FEE instead of FIXED for flag fall, and FIXED in localCost (satapp)

waitingMaxSpeed.description: Wait time charged while the vehicle is stopped or slowed to less than X KM per hour

parts.description: this describes a part of the fare (or discount).It contains a for instance the startup costs (fixed) or the flex part (e.g. 1.25 EUR per 2.0 MILES).The amount is tax included. In case of discounts, the values are negative.With 'MAX' you can specify e.g. a maximum of 15 euro per day. Percentage is mainly added for discounts.The `scale` properties create the ability to communicate scales(e.g. the first 4 kilometers you've to pay EUR 0.35 per kilometer, the kilometers 4 until 8 EUR 0.50 and above it EUR 0.80 per kilometer).

type.description: type of fare, can be single_ride or multiple_rides

Fare.description: the total fare is the sum of all parts, except for the 'MAX' farePart. This one describes the maximum price for the complete leg.

units.description: the number of km, seconds etc in the `per` part. In the first example of the description this should be 2.0

zoneIds.description: the zone/s that this farePart will be applied to. If missing this field, by default it's assumed that it will be applied to all the coverage (all the zones)

items.description: the zone/s that this farePart will be applied to. If missing this field, by default it's assumed that it will be applied to all the coverage (all the zones)

FarePart.description: this describes a part of the fare (or discount).It contains a for instance the startup costs (fixed) or the flex part (e.g. 1.25 EUR per 2.0 MILES).The amount is tax included. In case of discounts, the values are negative.With 'MAX' you can specify e.g. a maximum of 15 euro per day. Percentage is mainly added for discounts.The `scale` properties create the ability to communicate scales(e.g. the first 4 kilometers you've to pay EUR 0.35 per kilometer, the kilometers 4 until 8 EUR 0.50 and above it EUR 0.80 per kilometer).

id.description: A unique identifier for the TO to know this booking by

Location.description: information about the destination from an external provider (can differ from our 'to')

category.description: type of requirement, see enum for details

memo.description: extra field for detailed information, not standardized

Requirement.description: Requirements the users has ((dis)abilities, share [TRUE|FALSE], preferences [TBD])

abilities.description: Requirements the users has ((dis)abilities, share [TRUE|FALSE], preferences [TBD])

bringAlong.description: Requirements the users has ((dis)abilities, share [TRUE|FALSE], preferences [TBD])

SharedProperties.description: what kind of asset is this? Classify it, give the aspects. Most aspects are optional and should be used when applicable.

name.description: Key identifying the type of endpoint this is

url.description: URL for the endpoint, it can be absolute or relative

BookingOption.description: Options to book this particular product

weekdays.description: weekdays following cron-like format. valid values are 'MON-TUE', 'WED', 'MON-SUN

workingHours.description: working hours, currently only supports hour scale type

zones.description: List of zones that will be referenced by their ID's in fareParts for zone pricing.

virtualStopsRequireStopsNearby.description: Whether virtual stops require public stops nearby or not

DRTStops.description: List of DRT stops, if available

items.description: A single (X, Y) or (longitude, latitude) coordinate pair.

minHoursBefore.description: minimum hours before depart time cancellation is considered free of charge

cancellationFees.description: if missing, no cancellation is possible after minHoursBefore, if present, represents the fee to be charged to the user

PostBookingRule.description: post booking rule, if missing, it is assumed the user can cancel any time before depart, without being charged

minWeekdayBefore.description: minimum week day before booking time, goes along minTimeDayBefore

minTimeDayBefore.description: minimum hour of the day before booking time, goes along with minWeekdayBefore

planId.description: a unique identifier for this plan in the system

url.description: a fully qualified URL where the customer can learn more about this particular scheme

description.description: Text field describing the particular pricing plan in human readable terms.

waitingMaxSpeed.description: Wait time charged while the vehicle is stopped or slowed to less than X KM per hour

riderIds.description: list of riders this pricing rules is valid for, see product.riders

items.description: list of riders this pricing rules is valid for, see product.riders

restricted.description: If true, the fare requires agency approval. See restricted_description for text to show user.

restricted_description.description: Text to show the user if the fare is restricted.

title.description: Human-friendly string to describe this product.

id.description: unique id of the produce for this provider

defaultPlanId.description: default pricing rules or plan identifier

planIds.description: list of pricing rules or plan identifiers available for this product

items.description: list of pricing rules or plan identifiers available for this product

servicesIds.description: list of services this product is valid for

items.description: list of services this product is valid for

Zone.description: List of zones that will be referenced by their ID's in fareParts for zone pricing.

id.description: A unique identifier for the TO to know this booking by

pickupTime.description: ISO-8601 formatted date. Pick up time

callbackUrl.description: base callback/webhook url to send updates to (see /bookings/{bookingID}/events and /legs/{legID}/events)

validUntil.description: The time until which the presented options are (likely) available

nrOfTravelers.description: The number of people that intend to travel

travelers.description: Extra information about the people that intend to travel if relevant, length must be less than or equal to nrOftravelers

returnTripPickUpTime.description: ISO-8601 formatted date. Pick up time of the return trip.

estimate.description: estimate in cents (at least one of the 3 price estimates must be present)

lowEstimate.description: lower estimate in cents (at least one of the 3 price estimates must be present)

highEstimate.description: higher estimate in cents (at least one of the 3 price estimates must be present)

duration.description: estimate duration of the trip, in seconds

distance.description: estimate distance of the trip, in metres

depart.description: ISO-8601 formatted date. Either this or `arrive` is required.

arrive.description: ISO-8601 formatted date. Either this or `depart` is required. If this is provided, `destination` is required.

wheelchair.description: If a wheelchair-accessible vehicle is required

productId.description: ID of the product if quotes should be limited to that.

estimate.description: ETA for the product (in seconds). Always show estimate in minutes

deepLinkPattern.description: Will be used when booking is available, if we need need to add any of the enabled params.Deep link pattern, including the following placeholders between <>: fromLat, fromLng, fromAddress, toLat, toLng, toAddress, productId

deepLink.description: Will be used to open the app, any time, and also for bookings if deepLinkPattern is not present

country_code.description: REQUIRED if eco_label is defined. Country where the eco_sticker applies.

eco_sticker.description: REQUIRED if eco_label is defined. Name of the eco label. The name must be written in lowercase, separated by an underscore.

EcoLabel.description: Vehicle air quality certificate. Official anti-pollution certificate, based on the information on the vehicle's registration certificate, attesting to its level of pollutant emissions based on a defined standard.

contentUrl.description: URL to download image, or image code for SkedGo icons

fileFormat.description: Media type of image, including remoteIcon and remoteDarkIcon for SkedGo

enum: pt_pub, ps_tax, ps_tnc, ps_shu, cy_bic-s, me_car-s, me_car-r, me_car-p
pt_pub, ps_tax, ps_tnc, ps_shu, cy_bic-s, me_car-s, me_car-r, me_car-p

preferGenericMode.description: Whether is preferred to use the generic mode over the specific one

useGenericModeOnly.description: Whether the generic mode is the only one to be used used without adding a specific one

combined.description: Whether this provider is a combination of two (for Feonix)

userPhoneRequired.description: Whether the phone number is required to create a user

defaultUserPhoneNumber.description: Default number when no phone number is supplied and user phone is required

quoteDefaultDurationInSeconds.description: Whether the quote has a default duration before it expires, in seconds

billingEnabled.description: Whether the provider has enabled in app payment

stripePublishableApiKey.description: if billing is enabled, and the provider has it's own stripe account, this is the key that FEs need to contact stripe for that account

icon_url.description: A fully qualified URL pointing to the location of a graphic icon file that MAY be used to represent this vehicle type on maps and in other applications.

icon_url_dark.description: A fully qualified URL pointing to the location of a graphic icon file to be used to represent this vehicle type when in dark mode on maps and in other applications.

icon_last_modified.description: Date that indicates the last time any included vehicle icon images were modified or updated.

VehicleAssets.description: An object where each key defines one of the items listed below.

vehicle_type_id.description: Unique identifier of a vehicle type.

rider_capacity.description: The number of riders (driver included) the vehicle can legally accommodate.

cargo_volume_capacity.description: Cargo volume available in the vehicle, expressed in liters.

cargo_load_capacity.description: The capacity of the vehicle cargo space (excluding passengers), expressed in kilograms.

propulsion_type.description: The primary propulsion type of the vehicle.

eco_label.description: Vehicle air quality certificate. Official anti-pollution certificate, based on the information on the vehicle's registration certificate, attesting to its level of pollutant emissions based on a defined standard.

max_range_meters.description: If the vehicle has a motor (as indicated by having a value other than human in the propulsion_type field), this field is REQUIRED. This represents the furthest distance in meters that the vehicle can travel without recharging or refueling when it has the maximum amount of energy potential

name.description: The public name of this vehicle type.

vehicle_accessories.description: Description of accessories available in the vehicle. These accessories are part of the vehicle and are not supposed to change frequently.

items.description: Description of accessories available in the vehicle. These accessories are part of the vehicle and are not supposed to change frequently.

g_CO2_km.description: Maximum quantity of CO2, in grams, emitted per kilometer, according to the WLTP.

vehicle_image.description: URL to an image that would assist the user in identifying the vehicle. Allowed formats: JPEG, PNG.

make.description: The name of the vehicle manufacturer.

model.description: The name of the vehicle model.

color.description: The color of the vehicle. All words must be in lower case, without special characters, quotation marks, hyphens, underscores, commas, or dots. Spaces are allowed in case of a compound name.

wheel_count.description: Number of wheels this vehicle type has.

max_permitted_speed.description: The maximum speed in kilometers per hour this vehicle is permitted to reach in accordance with local permit and regulations.

rated_power.description: The rated power of the motor for this vehicle type in watts.

default_reserve_time.description: Maximum time in minutes that a vehicle can be reserved before a rental begins. When a vehicle is reserved by a user, the vehicle remains locked until the rental begins. During this time the vehicle is unavailable and cannot be reserved or rented by other users. The vehicle status in free_bike_status.json MUST be set to is_reserved = true. If the value of default_reserve_time elapses without a rental beginning, the vehicle status MUST change to is_reserved = false. If default_reserve_time is set to 0, the vehicle type cannot be reserved.

return_constraint.description: The conditions for returning the vehicle at the end of the rental.

default_pricing_plan_id.description: A plan_id, as defined in system_pricing_plans.json, that identifies a default pricing plan for this vehicle to be used by trip planning applications for purposes of calculating the cost of a single trip using this vehicle type.

pricing_plan_ids.description: Array of all pricing plan IDs, as defined in system_pricing_plans.json, that are applied to this vehicle type. This array SHOULD be published when there are multiple pricing plans defined in system_pricing_plans.json that apply to a single vehicle type.

items.description: Array of all pricing plan IDs, as defined in system_pricing_plans.json, that are applied to this vehicle type. This array SHOULD be published when there are multiple pricing plans defined in system_pricing_plans.json that apply to a single vehicle type.

VehicleType.description: Default vehicle type, as fallback for the cases where there is no specific information available

event.description: event operation. Same values as legState

bookingDataChanged.description: flag that indicates if the leg that corresponded to this operation changed it's data or not.

id.description: A unique identifier for the TO to know this leg by
